content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --STDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --ENDTC
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STDTC
      operator: date_greater_than
      value: --ENDTC
Core:
  Id: FDA.VALIDATOR.SD0013
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --STDTC is after --ENDTC
Outcome:
  Message: --STDTC is after --ENDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Validator Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: SD0013, Publisher ID FDAB034
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Start Date/Time of Event, Exposure or Observation
                  (--STDTC) must be less or equal to End Date/Time of Event, Exposure
                  or Observation (--ENDTC).
                Document: FDA Validator Rules v1.5
                Section: N/A
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - EVENTS
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - CO
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when --STDTC is after --ENDTC

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Start Date/Time of Event, Exposure or Observation (--STDTC) must be less or equal to End Date/Time of Event, Exposure or Observation (--ENDTC).
